attributes.additional_details:
Ifield Brook Meadows is a 'Beauty Spot' at the geographical centre of the ancient Parish of Ifield - within the Crawley Borough Council administrative boundary.

A Consortium of Developers & 'Partners' are still determined to make this part of a housing development, despite repeated planning objections by the community for the last 10 years.

The government should now make it very clear : "Hands Off Ifield Brook Meadows"
